title: Riot, we need pants
body:
As far as items go, we have almost everything covered, except for pants. We have : 
{{item:3089}} {{item:3090}}  2 Hats
{{item:1031}} A vest
{{item:1018}} {{item:2053}} {{item:1057}} 3 types of cloaks
{{item:3117}} {{item:3006}} {{item:3009}} {{item:3111}} {{item:3158}} {{item:3047}} {{item:3020}} 7 different boots
{{item:3742}} Do-dingy for our shoulders 
{{item:1056}} {{item:1004}} {{item:3112}} {{item:3190}}  Hipster accessories 
{{item:1011}} A belt 
{{item:3136}} {{item:3151}} Masks for the Yuletide Ball
{{item:3140}} A sash 
{{item:3068}} A Cape
But I see no pants or shorts among out items. Riot, please give us some pants

replies.body: Birds can't wear pants tho D: {{champion:34}}
Yet Corki flies faster with boots.
I like to think his copter is powered by him peddling super fast.
outplayed
Or he's just like Fred Flintstone.
Yabba dabba doo
Have you ever seen "corki: uncoptered"? :) On mobile so hard to link.
Yes! I love crazy Boris ;3

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Rainslight,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=OVXje5io,comment-id=000400020000,timestamp=2015-12-17T22:28:45.689+0000)
>
> I like to think his copter is powered by him peddling super fast.

But but, he rides a R.O.F.L. Copter......
But fish can wear boots? {{champion:267}}
https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/236x/6a/91/10/6a91109fffd85737c0f6dd61b8cc47c7.jpg

Actually she's pretty close already.
http://pic2.52pk.com/files/130112/1658505_041352609.jpg
CLOSE, BUT NOT PANTSY ENOUGH!
Well I'm sorry I'm not on the skins team and could wrap the rest of her armor around the back of her leg. XD
Yeah how dare you :3

Couldn't find Anivia specifically but I thing this shares the same theme:
https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/736x/84/64/33/8464339840ffad63921eef7033fc9aca.jpg
LOL. That is fantastic.
http://farm4.static.flickr.com/3032/2966630081_4532c933dd.jpg
Laying an egg isn't as easy as it looks.
Yet Zac can have all these items on without them falling off when he uses an ability? :D
1. Zac's not a bird tho D: {{champion:34}}
whatever he is, he should at least lose all his items when he dies
League of Legends: Runescape mode: lose all items upon death!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Rainslight,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=OVXje5io,comment-id=000400030000,timestamp=2015-12-17T23:46:14.404+0000)
>
> 1. Zac's not a bird tho D: {{champion:34}}

Whose fault is that for not getting him a bird-shaped mould to sleep in?

Who needs pants when your jacket covers it all :D

http://i.imgur.com/rCoolmO.jpg

Imagine if we started naked at the start of the game and began dressing (visually) by purchasing items. That'd mean lots of b*tt naked champions running on Summoner's Rift. I'd love to see an animation like that.
Pick or ban: {{champion:6}}
{{champion:103}} Yeah um, I'm going for the no item challenge.
i like the way you censored the word "butt"
Reported for foul language
Why would anyone buy items then?
{{champion:6}}
Still prefer naked
so does this mean that a {{champion:51}} would just have swords and daggers all over her body?

{{item:1057}}  {{item:1057}} {{item:1057}} {{item:1057}} {{item:1057}} {{item:1057}} 

I thought this was a seashell

> [{quoted}](name=Meteor Driz,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=OVXje5io,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2015-12-17T22:21:30.968+0000)
>
> {{item:1057}}  {{item:1057}} {{item:1057}} {{item:1057}} {{item:1057}} {{item:1057}} 
> 
> I thought this was a seashell

So if Hollywood has taught me anything, at full build you can poop twice.

This is hilarious (๑´ㅂ`๑)

I would love to see some concept art for {{champion:120}} ... 2-legged or 4-legged pants???
Secret Passive: Hecarim gains double bonuses for having 2 pairs of pants items
Pls, riot. Do it for fashion.

We also have...

{{item:1051}} {{item:3025}} {{item:3052}} {{item:3053}} gloves
{{item:3801}} {{item:3191}} bracers
{{item:3800}} helmets
We even have goddamn cosplay! {{item:3106}} wolverine claws!

But we can't have pants?!!
{{champion:110}} What are pants?
http://i3.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/928/702/426.gif
How can you party if you buy pants?

> [{quoted}](name=ThePartyLeader,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=OVXje5io,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-12-17T22:15:11.054+0000)
>
> How can you party if you buy pants?

You've never heard the old line, "Party in my pants!" before?
https://luluandthebox.files.wordpress.com/2015/09/pants-party.jpg?w=639
It helps that they each have cloak in their name.

> [{quoted}](name=n1njadragon,realm=EUW,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=OVXje5io,comment-id=000f,timestamp=2015-12-18T00:26:31.897+0000)

> How is this not a skirt? {{item:1057}} 

I always saw it like the cloak that Hao wore in Shaman King.

http://img15.deviantart.net/abab/i/2004/207/1/f/asakura_hao___manga__coloured_.jpg
{{item:3742}} It's called a pauldron.
Pauldron*
